Uses of Interface
com.amazonaws.lambda.mihai.tagpicture.service.FileSystemService

Packages that use FileSystemService
Package
Description
com.amazonaws.lambda.mihai.tagpicture.handlers
group of classes with handler behaviour in AWS Lambda Service; entry points in the archive that is built and deployed in AWS Lambda Service
com.amazonaws.lambda.mihai.tagpicture.service
group of classes and interfaces that forms a layer among the lambda handler and the AWS services; they mainly hold the clients for those services; the clients are thread safe and thus are made static at service class level
